title: Kaleido Star
synopsis: The Kaleido Stage is known throughout the world for captivating audiences with its amazing acrobatics, innovative routines, and extravagant costumes and sets. It is a place for guests to believe in magic, and Sora Naegino wants nothing more than to be a part of that magicâ€”by becoming an acrobat for the famed circus herself.
